CustomField.description: Week Ending date is set to the upcoming Sunday of the current week(This field was created for NPL MA).
CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD((WorkDate__c)- DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, WorkDate__c+7, 1, WorkDate__c+6, 2, WorkDate__c+5, 3, WorkDate__c+4, 4, WorkDate__c+3, 5, WorkDate__c+2, 6, WorkDate__c+1, WorkDate__c )
CustomField.label: WeekEnding Date
